main.name: Andy Zhou
main.bio: I'm a 21 year old aspiring full-stack developer. Looking for any programming related work/jobs related to JavaScript, React, C#, AWS, and mySQL.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions or work inqueries, please contact me with the form below!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: A 3 month full-stack programming bootcamp where I learned JavaScript, ReactJs, C#, mySQL, AWS, Razor Pages, HTML, CSS, and Heroku.
Learned about physical, chemical, and organic Chemistry. How molecules and elements are synthesized in nature as well as in man-made laboratories.

work.title: UI/UX Design Intern
work.description: Designed user interfaces and applications for B2B interactions and assisted in coding UX/UI capable of utilizing dynamic input.

work.title: UCR Math Tutor
work.description: Supported and tutored struggling, achieving, and gifted students in reaching academic goals. As well as handling test prep for students undergoing state standardized testing.

projects.title: Solar Excursions
projects.category: A React front-end application that utilizes styled components.

projects.title: Scratch
projects.category: Scratch is a single page application powered by a serverless API written completely in JavaScript.

projects.title: AccountOwner
projects.category: This is an ASP.NET Core Web API application that connects to a React client front-end application that consumes a REST API implemented on the .NET Core Web API server.

projects.title: Chess Game
projects.category: An interactive chess game built in React using JavaScript logic.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Andy Zhou must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of bootcamp and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
